resources.string: TEXT ONE: Do you wish you knew more Bibles verses? Are you always amazed at the people who seem to easily quote the Bible? Do you struggle with the time to memorise Bible verses? Well help is on it’s way. I found 10 short yet powerful verses that you can easily memorise to get you started to becoming brilliant when it comes to Scripture memory!

TEXT TWO: Yes it can. With so many things to remember-appointments, passwords, birthdays, anniversaries, phone numbers-the list goes on and on- one can wonder if our brains can handle one more thing to remember. The truth is God is so good to us, He created the human brain with an unlimited storage capacity.

TEXT THREE: Psalm 23: 1 ‘The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want ‘ John 3: 30 ‘ He must increase, but I must decrease.’ 1 Thessalonians 5: 16 ‘Rejoice always’ 1 John 4: 19 ‘We love Him because He first loved us’ Psalm 56:3 ‘Whenever l’m afraid, l will trust in You’
